question: What is the best trade according to hadith?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasoolullah (Salla Allahu alayhi wa sallam) was asked concerning the best income. He (SAW) replied "The sale with which the seller seeks a Halaal income and the work which a person those with his own hands. (Targeeb vol.2 pg.523 Daarul Ihyaaut Turaasul Arabi)
